price: У ота-онасига меҳрибон бўлиб, жабру ситам қилувчи, итоатсиз эмас эди.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
